general_info.summary: Students express overwhelming satisfaction with Noida International University (NIU), highlighting its positive environment, excellent library, helpful faculty and peers, and high-quality education. Many mention successful placements facilitated by the university's dedicated placement team and praise the overall development opportunities, including extracurricular activities and skill enhancement.
